attributes.additional_details:
Due to the coalitions cut backs, nursing staff looking after dialysis patient's will have their hours cut at the London hospital Whitechapel and other statalite units run by the above-mentioned

Patient's lifes will be put at risk for they may not be allowed their full hours of prescribed dialysis, this could result in death.

The NHS has become a death camp of hardship forced upon patient's, I ask that the nursing staff catering for dialysis have their hours immediatly installed to help save the life's of dialysis patient's
